## Description {#details}

Helper class for calculating the default number of inline elements for <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a>&lt;T&gt;</code>.

This should be migrated to a constexpr function when our minimum compiler support is enough for multi-statement constexpr functions.

Definition at line 1129 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallvector-h">SmallVector.h</a>.
